var rows = $input.all().map(function(i) { return i.json; }).filter(function(i) { return i.id; });
const items = rows.map(row => ({
  id: row.id,
  memberId: row.member_id,
  membreNom: (row.membre_nom || '') + ' ' + (row.membre_prenom || ''),
  mois: row.mois,
  annee: row.annee,
  salaireBase: Number(row.salaire_base || 0),
  primes: Number(row.primes || 0),
  deductions: Number(row.deductions || 0),
  chargesPatronales: Number(row.charges_patronales || 0),
  chargesSalariales: Number(row.charges_salariales || 0),
  netAPayer: Number(row.net_a_payer || 0),
  netImposable: Number(row.net_imposable || 0),
  statut: row.statut,
  commentaire: row.commentaire,
  createdAt: row.created_at,
  updatedAt: row.updated_at
}));
return [{json: {success: true, data: items}}];
